home.name: home
home.inittext: A couch with a soft blanket. Books. A photo of someone you love but have not seen for some time. A prayer mat.

town.name: town
town.inittext: Better apartments here than in your own neighborhood. Can you afford one? The calculations depress you. It is a cold yet good day.

crapfields.name: crapfields

commands.disp: Oh no, get out of here

crapfields.inittext: The smell is a thousand smells, old smells from which all the virtue has been taken by other, better people. Opportunities for labor abound.

bodega.name: bodega
bodega.inittext: Your favorite cat is pacing. Smells of coffee and pastrami. Lottery tickets print efficiently from a machine.

occult.name: occult
occult.inittext: Advertisements for tarot readers. Sandalwood and crystals. Dion Fortune paperbacks. Part of you resents this place.

bank.name: bank
bank.inittext: Two people flank the branch door: a holographic loan assistant, a woman with outstretched hand. Twin columns. The actual branch always seems closed.

hardware.name: hardware
hardware.inittext: Wood shavings, different kinds of grease, metal. The clerk watches you carefully, but not unkindly. More screws than you know how to understand.
